Kothapet.name: Knee Replacement Surgery
Kothapet.desc: Relieves pain and restores mobility in the knee joint.

Kothapet.name: Hip Replacement Surgery
Kothapet.desc: Replaces damaged hip joint with an artificial implant.

Kothapet.name: Hernia Surgery
Kothapet.desc: Repairs hernia and strengthens abdominal wall.

Kothapet.name: Gallbladder Removal
Kothapet.desc: Removes gallbladder to treat gallstones and infections.

Kothapet.name: Cataract Surgery
Kothapet.desc: Replaces clouded lens with a clear artificial lens.

Kothapet.name: LASIK Eye Surgery
Kothapet.desc: Corrects vision by reshaping the cornea.

Kothapet.name: Thyroid Surgery
Kothapet.desc: Removes part or all of the thyroid gland.

Kukatpally.name: Spine Surgery
Kukatpally.desc: Treats spinal disorders and relieves back pain.

Kukatpally.name: Varicose Vein Surgery
Kukatpally.desc: Closes or removes enlarged varicose veins.

Kukatpally.name: Breast Lump Removal
Kukatpally.desc: Removes abnormal breast lumps or masses.

Kukatpally.name: Circumcision
Kukatpally.desc: Surgical removal of foreskin from the penis.

Kukatpally.name: Sinus Surgery
Kukatpally.desc: Opens sinus pathways to improve breathing.

Kukatpally.name: Ear Surgery
Kukatpally.desc: Corrects hearing or cosmetic ear issues.

Kukatpally.name: Skin Grafting
Kukatpally.desc: Replaces damaged skin with healthy tissue.

Nampally.name: C-Section Delivery
Nampally.desc: Surgical delivery of a baby through the abdomen.

Nampally.name: Hysterectomy
Nampally.desc: Removes the uterus to treat various conditions.

Nampally.name: Laparoscopy
Nampally.desc: Minimally invasive diagnostic and surgical procedure.

Nampally.name: PCOD Surgery
Nampally.desc: Treats ovarian cysts and PCOD issues.

Vizag.name: Fracture Repair
Vizag.desc: Fixes broken bones using surgical techniques.

Vizag.name: Rotator Cuff Surgery
Vizag.desc: Repairs torn shoulder muscles and tendons.

Vizag.name: Meniscus Surgery
Vizag.desc: Repairs or removes damaged knee cartilage.

Vizag.name: Joint Arthroscopy
Vizag.desc: Minimally invasive joint evaluation and treatment.

Vizag.name: Plantar Fasciitis Surgery
Vizag.desc: Relieves heel pain due to plantar fasciitis.

Kurnool.name: Anal Polyp Removal
Kurnool.desc: Removes benign polyps from the anal canal.

Kurnool.name: Cholecystectomy
Kurnool.desc: Removes gallbladder due to stones or infection.

Kurnool.name: Diabetic Foot Surgery
Kurnool.desc: Treats infections and ulcers in diabetic feet.

Kurnool.name: ENT Endoscopy
Kurnool.desc: Examines ear, nose, and throat structures.
